name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
schedule:
1-2 Alcohols and Phenols
3-4 Ethers and Epoxides: Thiols and Sulfides
5-6 Aldehydes and Ketones
7-8 Carboxylic Acids and Nitirles
9 期中考
10-11 Nucleophilic Acyl Substitution
12-13 Carbonyl Alpha-Substitution Reactions
14-15 Carbonyl Condensation Reaction
16-17 Amines and Heterocycles
18 期末考
